pr_title: Aero Fighter refit heat sink tracking improvements

timeline.message: Determine number of aero engine-free heat sinks by engine type, not engine size
improved cleanup of integrated heat sinks for Aero

timeline.bodyText: The determination  of "is aero but not conventional fighter/smallcraft/jumpship" is used multiple times in this file, here and on line 2480. And probably in other places. Let's place it into a separate function for ease of reuse.
timeline.author: NickAragua

replies.bodyText:
I wasn't a fan of this either. I searched around to see if there was an operator similar to instanceof that didn't match on sub-classes. There doesn't appear to be one, however I ran across a post that suggested doing the equivalent of "newEntity.getClass() == Aero.class", which seems like it would work. In the end, I just went with the method previously used (I think the one you mentioned at line 2480).
"newEntity.getClass() == Aero.class" is technically more precise in that it would exclude TeleMissile and FighterSquadron as well (not sure how those are used).
Would you prefer I move the original to a function or use the "newEntity.getClass() == Aero.class" method?
replies.author: RexPearce

replies.bodyText: Let's give that getClass() == Aero.class thing a try. Just make sure to beat up on that code with other non-ASF unit types as well.
replies.author: NickAragua

timeline.bodyText: What about conventional fighters? Those behave the same way as tanks do as I recall.
timeline.author: NickAragua

replies.bodyText:
ConvFighters (and all other subclasses of Aero) should enter line 1457 with expectedHeatSinkParts = 0, and have all heat sink parts removed (except OmniPodded ones, but they'll only be present for Aero Fighters).
For readability, I could restore the check for ConvFighters back to line 1450, but I'd have to restore the check for AeroHeatSink as well. Either way works - let me know what you prefer.
replies.author: RexPearce

replies.bodyText: I don't think it's necessary, let's leave it as is.
replies.author: NickAragua
